text:
Oracle - Berlin, Germany

We were a young startup making a monitoring product for VoIP networks that was recently acquired by Oracle. Some things have changed in the process but we still work on the same product, have the same org-chart and use the same technologies. We also enjoy very stable jobs, above market salaries and a very nice office in the center of Berlin.

We're looking for generalists that enjoy writing software and creating stuff. You will be working mostly in Python and/or Javascript. Email me at tudor.g@gmail.com.
